website_summaries.verdict: A great alternative to the Apple pencil, this capacitive stylus pairs seamlessly with most iPads and other iOS devices.
pros: Very easy to set up and use with an iPad
Rechargeable stylus with several days of usage time
Transfers seamlessly from tablet to iPhone and back without having to reconnect each time
Handles small handwriting easily, with little to no lag
cons: Needs more pressure than an Apple pencil to use accurately
Artists may find it not responsive or accurate enough for detailed drawing

customer_reviews.title: Working well on my iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: Really good iPad pen! It’s working well on my iPad Pro and has 3 replacement heads. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Boya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good pen
customer_reviews.text: This pen is good. It does skip sometimes but it's not really a problem. As long as you draw carefully it shouldn't be a problem. If you have a protection cover you have to push a little harder but it's not bad. Since i dont have an ipad pro, i use this pen for the procreate app and it's pretty good. The only sucky thing is that it doesnt have that pressure sensitivity obviously. I love how the pen feels when I write, the quality is also good. I just hate how it turns off automatically after 120 seconds which can be annoying. Overall, I like this pen! I love the tip of then pen, very good and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Quality is high of this product. Sensitive To use. Size is very good for handing. Shipping is very fast
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Stylus Pen for my iPad 9.7 inch
customer_reviews.text: This stylus pen is really great. It comes in a nice box well packed so nothing get dammage during shipping. The pen is well design with the charging port hidden under a rubber cap (on the top of the pen). The led is great to indicate when its charging or low on battery. The 3 extra tip are great add on. The stylus pen work well on my Ipad and I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Very handy stylus
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is very easy to use, and the appearance level is very high, and the reaction to touch the screen is very fast, I tried it on the app, and the reaction is very fast.I think it would be nice to use for note-taking, and the pen is really nice looking and looks expensive.I think it is a very useful pen.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Does it have palm rejection
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone know if this is a Bluetooth stylus and will do palm rejection I'm a digital artist and plan to use it for that. And I also will be doing a YouTube video about it in the future.. I can't wait to get mine today. I use medibang for art does anyone else use this stylus it looks like a apple pencil but for the older generations of iPad ... Can't wait to get my iPad pro for the mean time this will have to work.
customer_reviews.author: pinkmadison

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Well, this pen has a little bit problem. Sometimes it click around the point where I put it. But it is cheap. Also the battery life is long. I am satisfied for writing for most of time. I probably will get an Apple Pencil before it breaks. I use it every day, but I do need a better one for drawing
customer_reviews.author: tianlu

customer_reviews.title: Grandmother loves it
customer_reviews.text: While it's not as perfect as the Apple Pencil, I found it as a large improvement over those typical "non-electric" styli with the rubber/cloth tips. It's definitely more sensitive. I bought it as a gift for my grandmother (who uses the typical cheaper styli), and she loves it! (Disclaimer: I don't know how it acts when doing notes and drawings, as I only demo-ed it for a while when my grandmother visited. It's still way better than those crappy "non-electric" styli with the rubber/cloth tips, though. I can tell you that much for sure!).
customer_reviews.author: Wiens Family

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good stylus for a good price!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son to use for his high school. He used this stylus during his program in school during the summer. And guess what? He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: ... to draw on his ipad and he seems to like it. He uses it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stylus for my brother because he likes to draw on his ipad and he seems to like it. He uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good value
customer_reviews.text: The pen has a nice heft and hand-feel. It comes with extra rubber tips - nice idea - and the tip glides smoothly over my iPad Pro. Much more convenient to use than the Apple Pencil as it is a reasonable size, has a pocket clip and charges over microUSB. Well worth the asking price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Biba

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, works on any capacitive screen, as advertised. The fine tip is very accurate, which makes drawing on a phone or tablet much easier, if that's what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.author: janet e ekelly

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: The feel of the pen is great and it is weighted well. I even love that it charges easily via microUSB but, what is the use of all these features if the stylus is unreliable? The writing is spotty, even when just drawing straight lines. The faster you write, the worse it is. But as a lecturer, you don’t have time to write slowly. I’ve gone back to using a cheapo but reliable $5 stylus. I really wanted to like it but can’t believe this stylus received so many favorable views. I would imagine this stylus would be a nightmare for drawing as well! I have to go over letters multiple times so drawing or sketching might be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: eych2oh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it to write on my iPad, work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jing5678

customer_reviews.title: Like the look & feel but..
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work with screen protectors which is fine for me. I tried it on my iPad mini 4 and noticed it doesn’t consistently write. It has a delay but it completely misses some lines. I did a test, see pictures attached. It also doesn’t start writing where the tip is, it’s a bit off. Overall, it’s a good deal for the price I’m just looking for something more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Coolkat

customer_reviews.title: Ipad Stylus
customer_reviews.text: I would of loved it if it didn’t leave marks on my screen Iike a eraser and it’s very noticeable and hard to draw because of it I love my screen to be clean& the charger that came with it won’t go fully in I just got a defective one it seems that can happen to things it’s rare tho they sent me a screen protector for my ipad it’s as ordered&everything&everything came packaged so good they shipped them in a really big box&Put stuff in it to protect the items& shipped very fast.They kindly let me send it back to get a refund as should have so there trustable this product was just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a Not so very responsive stylus. It missed a lot in writing. At times it seems to be responsive but more often than not, made my writing experience less desirable
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Works with 1st gen iPad, but nothing else I have.
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is supposed to function without bluetooth, and should be as simple as powering on. However, this stylus did not work with my iPad Air or iPad mini 4, but somehow worked with my first-generation iPad (which is so old that it cannot handle a drawing program). Unfortunately, it is not useful to me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This too was a product bought for my husband. He was impressed with price as well as the pen.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The pen worked great for about 2 days. I bought it to take notes on my IPad Air 2. My class was 2 hours long and after about three days of use in said class i would have to recharge it. Also when writing it was so inaccurate with how it touched the screen that some times I couldn’t even read what I wrote. However, my class was so note heavy that I just chugged through and was patient, but rewrote ALOT.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Veselic

customer_reviews.title: Great pen for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pen, simple to use. I have not had the opportunity to use it much, but very happy with it so for.
customer_reviews.author: DonBoe

customer_reviews.title: If you want it for every day scrolling and clicking its great
customer_reviews.text: This thing works fine for strolling and just clicking. It's not like you can't just use your fingers for that. It's Horrible and annoying for drawing it skips often even when you go slowly and wear a glove. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Yukiora

customer_reviews.title: Like description, works well & sleek
customer_reviews.text: Took it right out of the box and it started working immediately. Love the rubber top so it doesn’t scratch ipad, but I don’t know how well it works if you have a screen protector No lag-works for iPads listed in description- not for phone. The only thing I anticipate is the light doesn’t shut off when you click it -it turns off in 120 seconds of not being pushed or used so heads up if you have it in a case it may be dead by the time you need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is JUNK.  Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stylus to use for my iPad 10.5 and 12.9. The company says it can be used with both these devices. IT DOESN'T WORK WITH THE iPad 10.5 or the 12.9. You are better off spending your money with another company.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey T

customer_reviews.title: Find something better. This does not work well at all!
customer_reviews.text: This pen is not touch sensitive at all. I do not have a screen protector on my iPad and it is so slow. You must press and hold for it to recognize. I finally gave up and went back to my finger.
customer_reviews.author: catmitch

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first iPad stylus so nothing else to compare it to but I am super happy with it. Was able to use it right out of the box! Like the feel of it. Nice weight and like the feel of the rubber tip.
customer_reviews.author: RuthieB

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it would work really good on a capavitive touch screen that was decent . I was using it on a cf54 tough book . It dont have a good touch screen
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life but doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It worked briefly a few times but was not accurate and did not work consistently. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L Weiser

customer_reviews.title: Really like it.
customer_reviews.text: It came in a good condition, and I like the fact that it turns off by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The pen skipped and jumped on screen, had to tap several times sometimes. I sent it back, I didn’t like the rubber tip, would rather have the harder tip pen
customer_reviews.author: Pedro James

customer_reviews.title: Five Star
customer_reviews.text: It works great on my iPad Air 2, It doesn't feel cheap on hand. And the package is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: This product is a lie
customer_reviews.text: just like the first Heiyo brand stylus I brought back in November of 2017, which is listed separately from this one. I thought maybe this one was a new improved version of the first but I got duped twice. Just like the first there was almost no function from the stylus.
customer_reviews.author: tg80

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus
customer_reviews.text: Great stylus for drawing or clicking small items on a touchscreen. Great battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Touch pen
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave a 1 is it did not not work on my ipad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only stylus no where near to Apple Pencil
customer_reviews.text: Only a stylus and not Apple Pencil - would like to return it back
customer_reviews.author: Jagjit

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This pen is pretty accurate and easy to draw with. BUT due to the rubber tip the drag kinda makes it slower to draw with if you are a quick sketcher. I think this pen is a great alternative if you cannot afford the apple pen. The apple pen is still way more accurate but this pen is still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Pardenilla

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper than I pencil and words great!
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, it works great, it is very smooth, not afraid of scratching the screen, and there are 2 replacements, much cheaper than Ipencil, I am very happy with this product, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not good with iPhone SE.
customer_reviews.text: It was not good with my iPad and iPhone SE.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Good item!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good item! Slower than my writing but still good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Hight quality
customer_reviews.text: That pen is very useful, it has very comfortable design that make me keep writing a Long time without any negative feeling and high quality .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not work with my iPad pro 3rd generation.
customer_reviews.author: Sanny Vuu

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: They glide very smoothly over the phone screen and the all metal construction makes them feel more premium. They aren't too big so they fit easily in my smaller jacket pockets but are still big enough that they're easy to grip.I absolutely love these stylus's!!! Will definitely buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Bret Blevins

customer_reviews.title: No screen protector
customer_reviews.text: If you have a screen protector itll be harder for it to sense so you have to press down a bit harder. Without the protextor the sensitivity is fine and its just slightly worse tha. the apple pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Yates

customer_reviews.title: Perfection at low cost
customer_reviews.text: The only stylus pen I’ve ever found to work effectively on an iPad, and at quarter of the price of an Apple Pencil, it’s a no brainier!!! Great to draw, edit pictures, write notes, kids love it for colouring. What can I say? Awesome work!! Will definitely buy another
customer_reviews.author: Warren Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with how they work.
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely smoother than the regular rubber tip ones.I bought it mainly to play a specific game on my iPhone X which requires very quick and precise movements and this is much faster to use than using my finger , and much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: my friend
customer_reviews.text: My child especially likes to draw, this pen is very easy to use, the operation is simple and clear, give a like
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Wong

customer_reviews.title: hard to use
customer_reviews.text: it is work for my iPad, but I need to press so hard to write a word. and its reaction speed is very low.
customer_reviews.author: cuiying

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't even the right pen.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my item, ordered this pen and it wasn't even the right pen. Didnt work for my ipad either,sent right back.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Works well, value for money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Was worried it wouldnt work on my 9.7 2017 refurbished model but its working. What else can I say ? Its a pen which seems to do the job for note taking - I think it will take some getting used to make the handwriting look top notch whilst writing with speed. When I write a little slow it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Best

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Love this new stylus pen! the delivery is very fast. this pen works by just pressing the power button so generating an electrical circuit when in contact with the screen. no need of connecting by Bluetooth. Just press the power button to turn on.don't need to press the button again to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Brown

customer_reviews.title: I like this pen
customer_reviews.text: Love this stylus.This is the first stylus I’ve ever owned but it’s very nice. It is also very easy to use and doesn’t require any setup so it’s easy to switch between devices if you want to. If you are also looking for a great stylus try this one. I think you will love ve it also!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kring

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to use with the latest iPad Air - Mistake
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with the latest iPad Air, and didn't work at all. Crappy buy, would definitely not use this on any Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Sandoval C

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, convenient and handy
customer_reviews.text: This pen has good texture and high sensitivity. It can be used for a long time with a single charge. Both iPad and mobile phone can be used with satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: slina

customer_reviews.title: Working well on my iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: as described. product compatible with my phone, works nice, draws lines without making any stops etc. recommend it definitely if you need something inexpensive to draw precisely on the touch screen
customer_reviews.author: brods

customer_reviews.title: This Pen is very suitable For drawing in IPad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pen for my little brother, because he like to draw picture in his iPad. Just as what it described in the Features & details, this pencil is excellent for little young kid to learn how to use smart electronic pen to draw picture in iPad
customer_reviews.author: Colby Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Working well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stylus. It's fairly lightweight but has a nice design. This is my first time using a pencil style tip, which is much better then the ball or disk style ones I have used! I use it for drawing on my ipad, and have had no issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Marley Wood

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pen for my daughter’s ipad. It is a lot cheaper than the apple one. And does exactly the same. It’s great option if you don’t want to pay extra money for the brand. This pen is sleek and sturdy. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Frankie D.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my ipad
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much! Work smoothly with Notability APP. Excellent seller with three spare rubber tips!
customer_reviews.author: chen

customer_reviews.title: Very precise and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The stylus is easy to use, with great precision.I’ve been looking for a stylus for a while for my new iPad, however, due to the price of the Apple Pencil.This one is what i really needed. It can offer you smooth writing experience as a real pen. No break point, no any offset and no lag.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Hall

customer_reviews.title: Work with my iPad 6
customer_reviews.text: Well, the quality is higher than I thought. Because I do not have the iPad which could be compatible to the apple pencil, I need to buy this kind of pen for my note taking. I would like to say it's really useful
customer_reviews.author: Laura Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I test this pen and apple pen on my iPad pro. This pen is working very good on my pad. They are not much different for me. I am going to return the apple pen. Therefore, I think this pen has good price.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Nice stylus for iPad art etc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stylus pen for my iPad which i took recently. It works as good as a normal pen, so much comfortable to use. I use this to draw sketches for my company. I'm glad to my friend who recommended me this.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good first impression
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is pretty nice. It's the same size as a regular pen. It can be used on any device. You simply press on the power button and you're ready to go. It has a metal frame wich feel solid. I recommend this over the apple pen since it's a lot cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Greta Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Skips on 7th gen iPad! Great otherwise on older models.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stylus! It’s both functional and affordable! It works best on older iPads, doesn’t work on 2019 iPad 7th gen all that well. It skips a lot. Otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, used it a long time without needing to charge the battery. I can use it with my Android device. Good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Will work good but if you’re a perfectionist with your art I suggest another brand
customer_reviews.text: Works good but not as smooth as the apple pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love that this takes great notes on the iPad. Very compatible with older versions of the iPad which was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mutant Chief

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The pen is easy to use. It does a little bi=t of a lag, but Also needs to be charged fully for it to work fully. It works best with Autodesk App on Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first then became poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It worked well during the first hour then when I left to go do something, I turned it on and started drawing again and the lines were extremely wavy. I tried my finger and old stylus and they were perfect but not this.
customer_reviews.author: KyleeAnn

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: works great and easy to use.i love that it is compatible with all apple products.great product for a great value
customer_reviews.author: dnmhc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,sensitive
customer_reviews.text: It is sensitive to use and comfortable to handle it,and also it has 3 different tips to satisfy my needs.
customer_reviews.author: nancy dell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect IPad Stylus Pen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who uses it daily both on old iPad mini. It works perfectly, just like an Apple Pencil without having to buy an iPad Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple weeks. Still turns on and charges but doesn’t work with any touch screens. Isn’t damaged at all.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great ipad pen
customer_reviews.text: My older kids fight over it and keep asking me to order another. I love the on/off feature and is comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with iPads
customer_reviews.text: It says in the listing that this works with iPads but the user manual included with the stylus says it does NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Lia H.

customer_reviews.title: Not that well of a product
customer_reviews.text: The pen doesn’t work well it needs a lot of pressure to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.text: Easier to write on my tablet with this pen. A full charge lasts 40 hours. Lightweight and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and inexpensive compared to the other stylus pen. I recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stylus pen , my son uses it for drawing on the ipad , he loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Parker

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: To much Delay and you have to press hard to get it to write.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pen!
customer_reviews.text: writes really easily on the iPad smooth and it flows easily great pen definitely recommended if you don’t want fingerprints on you tablet!he fine point styli comes with 3 rubber-made tips so that protect your iPad screen from being scratched and without any noise when writing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cox

customer_reviews.title: must have accessory
customer_reviews.text: This pen is a must have accessory if you have an Ipad and use it for work or school work. The tips are sensitive and fine. Pair immediately after the ipad wakes up. No need to charge the pen everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Zhangyan

customer_reviews.title: Turn off automatically
customer_reviews.text: Great. Better than the last one. It can turn off automatically. Found it more smoother without the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus pen for ipad
customer_reviews.text: The stylus looks good and works fine, came sooner than expected. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Watson

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stylus pen, Perfectly works with my iPad Pro 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn Murphy

product_meta.title: Heiyo Stylus Pen iPad Pencil, Active Capacitive Digital Pens Supporting 40-Hour Working 30-Day Standby Touchscreen iPad Stylus for iPad Series (3 Replaceable Tips)
feature_bullets: 【Excellent Sensitivity】: iPad pencil has passed FCC Certification, Offer you smooth writing experience as a real pen. No break point, No offset and lag. No need for any bluetooth connection, just press the button to power on and use it directly
【Wide Compatibility】: Heiyo ipad stylus pen is perfectly compatible with iPad/iPad 2/New iPad 3/iPad 4/iPad Air/iPad Air 2/iPad Mini/iPad Mini 2/iPad Mini 3/iPad Mini 4

【Ultra Power-Saving】: The 13g rechargeable stylus active pen with a mirco USB cable supports 30-day standby time and 40-hour playing time only for 4-hour charging time, auto power-off after 120 seconds when the pen move out the touchscreen
【3 Replaceable TIPS】: iPad pen set comes with 3 rubber-made tips so that protect your iPad screen from being scratched and without any noise when writing,every pen tip can be wrote for 790000 inches

【Professional Design】: Simple and stylish touchscreen stylus can be used for hand writing, drawing, marking, signing and making notes anytime and anywhere by artists, architects, officers, teachers, students and children

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars162 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
